name: Noveline Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
tag_list: document-management, email-archival, image-management, software-services, productivity-suite, software, technology
overview:
Noveline Technologies Pvt. Ltd (NTPL) offers IT strategy and consultancy to corporate customers. NTPL interacts with clients to understand their business and conceptualize and create project plans for solutions that enhance their decision making ability and provide them with a cutting edge over competition.

IT conceptualizations are driven by business needs and strategy and using the power of technology as tool to drive business benefits. Noveline’s experienced IT technical team offers a portfolio of services that will helps with the implementation of your business IT needs.

It’s R & D initiatives consistently indulge into new technologies and experimentation to deliver more cutting edge solutions for our clients.

SOFTWARE PRODUCTS 1) Classic Doxplore - document management + Outlook email archival 2) Professional Doxplore - document management + Outlook email archival + 3 built in productivity apps 3) Undupe - Content based duplicate file finder

ABOUT NOVELINE TECHNOLOGIES

Noveline Technologies Pvt. Ltd. was established in 2009. Its corporate office is in Mumbai.

NTPL leverage stechnology to create business value for our clients. It believes that technology must be used to solve business problems and as a tool for growth.
